name: Friday Night Funkin' - Caramelldansen REMASTERED!
description:
PLAY THE ORIGINAL MOD: https://gamebanana.com/mods/45973

It's about time I remastered my only mod as of now! This mod includes:

  • The Modding+ Engine!
  • New input system (the one from Kade Engine if I'm not mistaken)
  • A new version of the level! You can also still access the classic version through Free Play!
  • More levels to come in the future!

I hope you have a blast with this short-ass mod!

Get the mod approved on GameBanana: https://gamebanana.com/mods/317898
